briefTitle: In Vitro Detection of Tissue Abnormality
officialTitle: In Vitro Detection of Tissue Abnormality
primaryOutcomeMeasure: •Accuracy of LS BioPath TOUCH device compared to pathology
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients aged 25-80 who are scheduled for surgical excision of tissue.

Exclusion Criteria:

* No prior history of surgery at location of current surgery.
